item.description:
Full Sap Moon Yoga

Get your juices flowing with a Zumba Warm-up Routine followed by a Power Yoga Workout!

It's time to spring into spring under the Full Sap Moon. This evening, we will be featuring $2 pure Connecticut Maple Syrup Shots!

Zumba
Let's face it, working out can be healthy, rewarding and beneficial. Working out can be lots of things, but it's never been known to be an exhilarating experienceâ€¦ UNTIL NOW! Zumba fuses hypnotic Latin rhythms and easy-to-follow moves to create a one-of-a-kind fitness routine that will blow you away.

Power Yoga
A derivative of Ashtanga yoga, Power yoga has been made more accessible to western students. It includes poses for strength and flexibility within a flowing smooth sequence of moves. Power Yoga challenges you like no other, and leaves you feeling awake and aware, energized and revitalized, and cleansed and calm.

Tea & Juice Bar opens at 6 pm. Heat up in the Sauna anytime from 6-8 pm. Zumba starts at 6:30 and Power Yoga starts at 7 pm.


Growing Green Wellness Center
Cost:$15 members/$20 non-members (goes towards a monthly membership if you want to join!)


Other possibilities ...

Try Kristy's special maple exfolient foot massage scrub to clear away your tension andease tired feet!
You can pre-book with Kristy -- 860.436.4923 or kristyL03@cox.net -- anytime between 5:30 and 7 pm.
Cost: $15 for 15 minute foot soak & scrub.

And, enjoy the immune boost of Nutrient Dense Auyervedic Mineral Pitch S*H*I*L*I*J*I*T to get you through the workout! What a difference! $2 a shot
item.name: Full Sap Moon --- Yoga to Get the Juices Flowing!
